participant_abstract.sent: This meeting was about making decisions with regard to the specific functions of the remote.
The group agreed about the majority of functions and we all came away feeling that this product will really rock the remote industry.

participant_actions.sent: Next meeting I will be presenting on the look and feel design of the remote.

participant_decisions.sent: Hard plastic base in gun metal grey.
Soft latex overlay produced as per the latest fashions.
Voice traking software for finding missing remote using a keyword.
Volume/channel up/down buttons located on side of the remote.
Circular button pattern for buttons on face of remote.
Logo will appear in strip of yellow accross bottom of remote and covers will have cut out for it.
Buttons will be blue with yellow light underlay (lights up yellow when depressed).

participant_problems.sent: Still unsure about the type of battery we will want to use for this remote.
Lithium or regular AA or AAA??
